comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Pic taken at Govett's Leap lookout...looking down Govett's Creek and Rodriguez Pass to the Grose River Valley...When I lived in the big S I'd often catch the train  up here and go hiking on week-ends...in all kinds of weather. I thought it was paradise! The hike from Victoria Falls to here was perhaps my favourite. I've since been sentenced to bang two rocks together for the term of my natural life at the Moreton Bay penal colony, so I don't get back this way very often. I miss it heaps!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Yes it is indeed! Thank you quasymody. It is certainly one of my fave places. Hehe, penal colony :P

comment._content: I think that is Evans Lookout,  not Govett Leap Lookout.
